Payment-Mode ​

Example ​

js
<PaymentMode :paymentmode="devis.paymentmode" />
1

Props ​

NameTypeDescriptionDefault

vue

import { PaymentMode } from 'v-invoice'
</script>

	<PaymentMode :paymentmode="devis.paymentmode" />
	<!-- fournissez la variable devis -->
</template>
